app.name: switch2uneek
app.long_description:
This is a simple application for Wii user to switch between real NAND and UNEEK NAND.
Usage: To initialize prepare all required files in the appropriate folder of SD card and USB drive.
Controls: Depending whether bootmii and/or bootmiiuneek folders are available in the SD card, The choice of buttons [A] and [B] will be provided accordingly. Typically with the right set-up of folder, only button [A] needs to be used for switching between real and UNEEK NAND. And to choose from available UNEEK NANDs use buttons [+],[-], and then button [A] for confirming the selection (Wii will reboot after this. Push button [Home] to exit without switching. You cannot switch between available UNEEK NANDs while you are running UNEEK+DI.
Credits: crediar for developing this great emulated wiibrew application SNEEK/UNEEK.
